tool_description: House of wisdom api gives arabic fake data, good for bootstraping databases etc.
name: HOW
title: HOW

api_list.name: First names
api_list.description: Gives an array of arabic first names and their equivalent gender.

api_list.name: Full name
api_list.description: generates a random arabic full name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://how1.p.rapidapi.com/names/fullname"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "how1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
